segments.text: Excuse me , could you tell me whether there is a restaurant near here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there is one at Sanyuan Bridge . It is a famous restaurant in the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid there must be a lot of people there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . I think you'd better make a phone call to see whether there is a table available .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we don't know the telephone number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is a tourist guidebook . You can look it up in the book .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are so kind ! Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1
